column4: (She giggles) You can play games while bound, but don't expect me to understand you.
Hello and welcome to the arcade. Put on your VR headset and you can play our games for free!

column3: I don't have a VR headset.
column4: You can rent one of ours for 10$.

column3: Can you take my headset off?

column4: No problem. "It's better to buy your own
column5: that way you can play kinky games by yourself."

column3: Can you put mine on for me?

column4: I see what you're trying to say. Enjoy the games!
